name: Metoprolol
description: It can treat high blood pressure, chest pain (angina), and heart failure. This may lower the risk of death after a heart attack.

name: Atorvastatin
description: It can treat high cholesterol and triglyceride levels. This may reduce the risk of angina, stroke, heart attack, and heart and blood vessel problems.

name: Tadalafil
description: It can treat erectile dysfunction and enlarged prostate (benign prostatic hyperplasia). It can also treat high blood pressure in the lungs (pulmonary arterial hypertension).

name: Azithromycin
description: It can treat various types of infections, including pink eye (bacterial conjunctivitis).

name: Penicillin
description: Penicillins are a group of antibiotics originally obtained from Penicillium moulds, principally P. chrysogenum and P. rubens. Most penicillins in clinical use are chemically synthesised from naturally-produced penicillins

name: Clindamycin
description: It can treat various types of infections, including skin and vaginal infections.
